item.title: John Senior's List of 1000 Good Books
item.description: The following is John Senior’s List of 1000 Good Books which can be found at the end of his most famous work, The Death of Christian Culture. A word of warning: The last thing you should do is treat this list as an authoritative syllabus which you must follow every step of your child’s development at precisely the right age. Inside The Death of Christian Culture John Senior himself warned against those who compile “itchy lists”.
